findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of tokens
findings.description: Deployer can mint an unlimited number of tokens after initial deployment.

findings.title: Deployer can set max transaction limit with an indefinite amount
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to set a maximum transaction limit without any restrictions or bounds, potentially leading to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Deployer can set and modify taxes/fees
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to set and modify taxes or fees within the contract.

findings.title: Deployer can pause/lock the contract
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to pause or lock the contract, which may lead to unintended consequences.
